2277.verse: فَأَتَتْ|Then she came|121|132|11161$بِهِۦ|with him|75|98|204$قَوْمَهَا|(to) her people,|125|148|11162$تَحْمِلُهُۥ‌ۖ|carrying him.|105|128|11163$قَالُواْ|They said,|89|112|101$يَـٰمَرْيَمُ|"O Maryam!|96|107|2814$لَقَدْ|Certainly,|83|160|3466$جِئْتِ|you (have) brought|149|302|11164$شَيْــًٔا فَرِيًّا|an amazing thing.|137|214|11165$

2280.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|79|309$إِنِّى|"Indeed, I am|109|122|312$عَبْدُ|a slave|67|80|11172$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah.|86|99|606$ءَاتَـٰنِىَ|He gave me|98|111|11173$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Scripture|107|120|451$وَجَعَلَنِى|and made me|108|114|11174$نَبِيًّا|a Prophet.|89|89|11175$

2281.verse: وَجَعَلَنِى|And He (has) made me|171|188|11174$مُبَارَكًا|blessed|84|118|3106$أَيْنَ مَا|wherever|81|115|1330$كُنتُ|I am|64|98|4182$وَأَوْصَـٰنِى|and has enjoined (on) me|189|206|11176$بِٱلصَّلَوٲةِ|[of] the prayer|119|166|11177$وَٱلزَّكَوٲةِ|and zakah,|100|194|11178$مَا دُمْتُ|as long as I am|121|215|5392$حَيًّا|alive|52|99|11116$

2282.verse: وَبَرَّۢا|And dutiful|91|100|11109$بِوَٲلِدَتِى|to my mother,|114|132|11179$وَلَمْ|and not|71|89|2566$يَجْعَلْنِى|He (has) made me|141|159|11180$جَبَّارًا|insolent,|76|94|11111$شَقِيًّا|unblessed.|90|99|11078$

2287.verse: فَٱخْتَلَفَ|But differed|97|103|11186$ٱلْأَحْزَابُ|the sects|104|116|11187$مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ‌ۖ|from among them,|140|152|11188$فَوَيْلٌ|so woe|67|80|749$لِّلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|120|750$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|96|59$مِن|from|50|56|53$مَّشْهَدِ|(the) witnessing|128|224|11189$يَوْمٍ|(of) a Day|88|280|2331$عَظِيمٍ|great.|75|171|3522$

2288.verse: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ|How they will hear!|147|158|11190$وَأَبْصِرْ|and how (they will) see!|181|203|11191$يَوْمَ|(the) Day|84|106|1057$يَأْتُونَنَا‌ۖ|they will come to Us,|160|182|11192$لَـٰكِنِ|but|64|75|3648$ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ|the wrongdoers|123|157|2019$ٱلْيَوْمَ|today|67|135|2217$فِى|(are) in|69|137|89$ضَلَـٰلٍ|error|77|145|3468$مُّبِينٍ|clear.|66|100|3469$

2276.verse: So eat and drink and be contented. And if you see from among humanity anyone, say, 'Indeed, I have vowed to the Most Merciful abstention, so I will not speak today to [any] man.' "

2277.verse: Then she brought him to her people, carrying him. They said, "O Mary, you have certainly done a thing unprecedented.

2278.verse: O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of evil, nor was your mother unchaste."

2279.verse: So she pointed to him. They said, "How can we speak to one who is in the cradle a child?"

2280.verse: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.

2281.verse: And He has made me blessed wherever I am and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I remain alive

2282.verse: And [made me] dutiful to my mother, and He has not made me a wretched tyrant.

2283.verse: And peace is on me the day I was born and the day I will die and the day I am raised alive."

2284.verse: That is Jesus, the son of Mary - the word of truth about which they are in dispute.

2285.verse: It is not [befitting] for Allah to take a son; exalted is He! When He decrees an affair, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.

2286.verse: [Jesus said], "And indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. That is a straight path."

2287.verse: Then the factions differed [concerning Jesus] from among them, so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day.

2288.verse: How [clearly] they will hear and see the Day they come to Us, but the wrongdoers today are in clear error.
